actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide rental assistance under section eight of the United States Housing Act of 1937 for owners of mobile homes who rent the real property on which their mobile homes are located.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make assistance payments for the purpose of aiding any lower-income family in making rental payments with respect to real property on which is located a mobile home owned by such family and utilized by such family as its principal place of residence.

titles.title: A bill to provide rental assistance under section eight of the United States Housing Act of 1937 for owners of mobile homes who rent the real property on which their mobile homes are located.
